original_text: There is none to guide her among all the sons whom she hath brought forth; neither is there any that taketh her by the hand of all the sons that she hath brought up.
korean_text: 네가 낳은 모든 아들 중에 너를 인도할 자가 없고 네가 양육한 모든 아들 중에 그 손으로 너를 이끌 자도 없도다

sentences.original_text: There is none to guide her
among all the sons whom she hath brought forth
neither is there any that taketh her by the hand
of all the sons that she hath brought up
